片.definition: thin piece; flake; a slice; film; TV play; to slice; to carve thin; partial; incomplete; one-sided; classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water; classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc; used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc; Kangxi radical 91

片刻.definition: short period of time; a moment

片尾.definition: closing segment of a film or TV show etc; end credits

片段.definition: fragment (of speech etc); extract (from book etc); episode (of story etc)

片警.definition: community police officer; police officer responsible for a particular neighborhood or community

片酬.definition: remuneration for playing a role in a movie or television drama

片頭.definition: (cinema, TV) title sequence; opening credits; intro
